name: Union Finance
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en: The Union Protocol is a credit network that enables any address to accumulate an unsecured credit line on-chain in a permission-less, crypto-native way.
